transcript:
Customer: Ho mera bhola hai bhandari kare nandi ki sawari shambhu nath re ho shankar nath re

Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Good afternoon
Executive: Sir main Roshan baat kar raha hun Siddhant ka manager Indiamarted office se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Actually sir kuch problem aa rahi thi wo by lead wagera ko leke dikkat aa rahi thi na aapki inke sath mein baat hui hui thi.
Customer: Kal to do consume kiya hai maine by lead.
Executive: Haan haan. Sir main bas wahi aapko batana chah raha tha aapke product line mein na by lead aati hai aur turant ke turant sold out ho jati hai.
Customer: System mein check kar rahe hain dekhte hain abhi hota hai to kal do to by lead consume kiya hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan dekhte hain kaisa hota hai.
Customer: Ji bilkul aap wahi main keh raha tha ki thoda jyada aap active raha kare jitna jyada aap active rahenge na aapki probability of consuming by lead utni jyada hogi.
Executive: Right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na aur koi aur dekhta hai sir aapke yahan pe by lead wagera koi aur dekhta hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Aap hi dekhte ho?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Chalo koi baat nahi sir aapka product bhi achcha hai product line bhi achcha hai do teen bhi deal agar do saal mein mature ho jati hai to aapka pura ROI will be covered lekin please hamara suggestion bas yahi rahega ki aap jitna jyada active reh sakte hain aap please Indiamart ka application bhi download kar lijiye jitna jyada aap active rahenge na probability of consuming by lead utni jyada hogi aur sir koshish kijiyega ki before office aur after office hour.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Thoda aap ek ek ghanta haan before office hour aur after office hour aap ek ek ghanta time de kyunki kya hota hai na us samay pe jyada log active nahi rehte.
Customer: Website khuli rakhte hain khuli rakhte hain website abhi aayega turant dikhta hai.
Executive: Haan exactly.
Executive: Kyunki sir ye product line mein na hamare paas by lead generation bahut achchi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab kyunki problem ye ho jati hai ki hamare paas mein isme industry leader tak bhare hue hain to by lead uske accordingly distribute hote hue cheeze aage badh jati hai to wo log jyada active rehte hain to jaldi able to consume that by lead.
Customer: Barabar.
Executive: Right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap kyunki sir last month mein dekh raha hun aap sirf che din active the uske pehle aap sirf char din active the uske pehle aap sirf August mein 15 din active the July mein sir aap 20 din active the to pure mahine mein aapne 68 by lead aapne consume kari thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To number of active days bhi aapka jitna rahega utna jyada hoga June mein sir aapne 20 concrete batching plant ki by lead consume kari thi July mein aapne 17 kari August mein aapne 12 kari.
Executive: Fir do mahine se hum active nahi hai to hamara by lead consumption bilkul kam ho ja raha hai.
Customer: To us time tha mere paas employee tha iske liye wo kiya tha.
Executive: Achcha koi person aapne rakh rakha tha?
Customer: Wo tha wo chala gaya aata hai to karta hai wo sab dekhte rehte hain nahi rehta hai to fir aise hi rehta hai.
Executive: Wahi ek dikkat hai sir ki aap aap sari cheeze dekh rahe hain aap owner hain to aapke sath mein aap utna time de nahi paate hain.
Executive: Chaliye koi nahi fir bhi catalog wagera mein kuch requirement hoti hai changes ki to wo main aapke catalog mein main changes kar deta hun although humne catalog wagera aapko yaad hoga meri aapse
Customer: Maine update kar diya hai sara.
Executive: Aap screw conveyor mein deal nahi kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Oh ye part hai hamare plant ke sath hi aata hai wo sab part plant ke sath hamare part hai.
Executive: Kyunki ye aapke catalog mein na as a specific product
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ye aapke product mein na as a specific product dala hua hai.
Customer: Haan malum hai wo to isliye wo to stop kara hua hai inactive kar diye.
Executive: Right right right right.
Executive: Chaliye koi nahi sir hum bhi apne side se try karte hain aap bole.
Customer: Pura plant ka hi mere ko by lead chahiye.
Executive: Redimix concrete plant concrete batching plant mobile concrete batching plant right?
Customer: Plant plant ka hi chahiye haan baki koi by lead ki jarurat nahi hai wo baki ka jo product dala tha na wo sab maine inactive kar diya hai nahi jarurat hai uski.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: By lead aayegi uske chakkar mein fir jo main by lead hai wo reh jati hai.
Executive: Understood sir understood.
Executive: Chaliye koi nahi aap please thoda active rahiyega aap jitna jyada active rahenge aur sir hamesha recent section mein aur location mein all location laga ke rakha kijiyega filter.
Customer: Wo wo karwaya hua hai refreshing wala wo isi ne to kiya tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir baki aur kisi tarah ki koi dikkat hum fir se ek bar connect kar lenge will be connected on WhatsApp to sir aapki jo call aayi thi na uska feedback open ho gaya tha to main ye feedback abhi close kar raha hun please aap feedback jarur share kijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir aur sir ek cheez aap mujhe aur bataye hello?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek cheez mujhe aap aur bataye hum ye sab keyword aapke profile mein update kar sakte hain kya modular concrete mixing plant mini batching plant mobile concrete batching plant redimix concrete plant ye sab keyword bhi hum update kar sakte hain?
Customer: Haan kar do na koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Matlab plant related jitne keyword hai wo sare hum update kar sakte hain right?
Customer: Haan kar sakte hain.
Executive: Jaise mobile hot mix plant ho gaya mobile asphalt plant ho gaya hot mix plant ho gaya asphalt
Customer: Hot mix plant alag alag hai batching plant jitne bhi hai concrete wale wo achcha add kar sakte ho.
Executive: Okay batching plant related keyword hum update kar sakte hain.
Customer: Haan okay wo concrete ka nahi hai wo damar ka hai asphalt ka hai wo alag hai.
Executive: Achcha aur sir by lead ke alava jo aapke paas mein direct inquiries aati hai customer ke connect ke through.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usse aap kam kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi aata waisa.
Executive: Direct inquiry sir aapke paas mein ek mobile concrete batching plant ki aayi hui thi
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Indore se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek sir aapke paas mein 28 October ko aayi hui thi redimix concrete making plant ka mixing plant ka.
Customer: Wo sab check karne wale jyada rehte hain wo isme aap aap jaise bolte hain na utne wo proper buyer nahi rehte usme sirf check karne wale rehte hain kaun banata hai kya karta hai wo sab wahi hai.
Executive: Okay got it.
Executive: Chaliye koi nahi sir hamara hamara kam hai try karte rehna hum bhi apne side se best try karte hain aap please jitni jyada aap activity badha sakte hain please aap apni activity badhaiye right baki hum bhi keywords wagera ke addition mein kuch dekhte hain if we can update something to hum update kar dete hain aur jo bhi dikkat hoti hai will will surely connect on it again.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with buyleads.

- Wants only plant-related buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.

- Agreed to update profile with plant-related keywords.

- Feedback link will be closed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will try from their side.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, keywords, profile update
